verses.verse: But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>: for Achan <S%H5912><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi <S%H3756><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi <S%H2067><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> of the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>: and the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H582><s%> from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%>, which is beside <S%H5973><s%> Bethaven <S%H1007><s%>, on the east side <S%H6924><s%> of Bethel <S%H1008><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> unto them, saying <S%H559><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> and view <S%H7270><s%> the country <S%H776><s%>. And the men <S%H582><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> and viewed <S%H7270><s%> Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Let not all the people <S%H5971><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%>; but let about two or three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> Ai <S%H5857><s%>; and make not all the people <S%H5971><s%> to labour <S%H3021><s%> thither; for they are but few <S%H4592><s%>. about: Heb. about two thousand men, or, about three thousand men

So there went up <S%H5927><s%> thither of the people <S%H5971><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: and they fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> of them about thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: for they chased <S%H7291><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> even unto Shebarim <S%H7671><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them in the going down <S%H4174><s%>: wherefore the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%>, and became as water <S%H4325><s%>. in: or, in Morad

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> his clothes <S%H8071><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> until the eventide <S%H6153><s%>, he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and put <S%H5927><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Alas, O <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, wherefore hast thou at all <S%H5674><s%> brought <S%H5674><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, to destroy <S%H6><s%> us? would to God <S%H3863><s%> we had been content <S%H2974><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>!

O <S%H994><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%>, what shall I say <S%H559><s%>, when <S%H310><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> turneth <S%H2015><s%> their backs <S%H6203><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>! backs: Heb. necks

For the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of it, and shall environ us round <S%H5437><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> our name <S%H8034><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>: and what wilt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto thy great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>?
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Get thee up <S%H6965><s%>; wherefore liest <S%H5307><s%> thou thus upon thy face <S%H6440><s%>? liest: Heb. fallest

Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and they have also transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them: for they have even taken <S%H3947><s%> of the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>, and have also stolen <S%H1589><s%>, and dissembled <S%H3584><s%> also, and they have put <S%H7760><s%> it even among their own stuff <S%H3627><s%>.

Therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>, but turned <S%H6437><s%> their backs <S%H6203><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>, because they were accursed <S%H2764><s%>: neither will I be with you any more <S%H3254><s%>, except <S%H3808><s%> ye destroy <S%H8045><s%> the accursed <S%H2764><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

Up <S%H6965><s%>, sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves against to morrow <S%H4279><s%>: for thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, There is an accursed thing <S%H2764><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>: thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, until ye take away <S%H5493><s%> the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

In the morning <S%H1242><s%> therefore ye shall be brought <S%H7126><s%> according to your tribes <S%H7626><s%>: and it shall be, that the tribe <S%H7626><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> taketh <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> according to the families <S%H4940><s%> thereof; and the family <S%H4940><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall take <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> by households <S%H1004><s%>; and the household <S%H1004><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall take <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man <S%H1397><s%>.

And it shall be, that he that is taken <S%H3920><s%> with the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, he and all that he hath: because he hath transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and because he hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>. folly: or, wickedness

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and brought <S%H7126><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their tribes <S%H7626><s%>; and the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>:

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and he took <S%H3920><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%>: and he brought <S%H7126><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man <S%H1397><s%>; and Zabdi <S%H2067><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>:

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> his household <S%H1004><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man <S%H1397><s%>; and Achan <S%H5912><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi <S%H3756><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi <S%H2067><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, was taken <S%H3920><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Achan <S%H5912><s%>, My son <S%H1121><s%>, give <S%H7760><s%>, I pray thee, glory <S%H3519><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and make <S%H5414><s%> confession <S%H8426><s%> unto him; and tell <S%H5046><s%> me now what thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>; hide <S%H3582><s%> it not from me.

And Achan <S%H5912><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Indeed <S%H546><s%> I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and thus and thus have I done <S%H6213><s%>:

When I saw <S%H7200><s%> among the spoils <S%H7998><s%> a <S%H259><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> Babylonish <S%H8152><s%> garment <S%H155><s%>, and two hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and a <S%H259><s%> wedge <S%H3956><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> weight <S%H4948><s%>, then I coveted <S%H2530><s%> them, and took <S%H3947><s%> them; and, behold, they are hid <S%H2934><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my tent <S%H168><s%>, and the silver <S%H3701><s%> under it. wedge: Heb. tongue

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%>, and they ran <S%H7323><s%> unto the tent <S%H168><s%>; and, behold, it was hid <S%H2934><s%> in his tent <S%H168><s%>, and the silver <S%H3701><s%> under it.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> them out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and laid them out <S%H3332><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. laid: Heb. poured

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, took <S%H3947><s%> Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, and the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the garment <S%H155><s%>, and the wedge <S%H3956><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and his oxen <S%H7794><s%>, and his asses <S%H2543><s%>, and his sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and his tent <S%H168><s%>, and all that he had: and they brought <S%H5927><s%> them unto the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Why <S%H4100><s%> hast thou troubled <S%H5916><s%> us? the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall trouble <S%H5916><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>. And all Israel <S%H3478><s%> stoned <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> them with fire <S%H784><s%>, after they had stoned <S%H5619><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%>.

And they raised <S%H6965><s%> over him a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>. So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>. Wherefore the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%>, The valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>. Achor: that is, Trouble
